Chief complaint.cc_description: blank (data_type:string, range_candidate_guide:Describe in the patient's words)

symptom_{n}.length: blank (data_type:number, range_candidate_guide:0-24 (Unit: week, over 24 is represented as 24))

Present illness.triggering factor: blank (data_type:string, range_candidate_guide:The reason patient came to the hospital at this time)
Present illness.stressor: blank (data_type:string, range_candidate_guide:(multiple answers available) home/work/school/legal issue/medical comorbidity/interpersonal difficulty/none)

Past psychiatric history.presence: blank (data_type:boolean, range_candidate_guide:Randomize(50%) the presence or absence of past psychiatric history. If 'false', then remove all children of 'pph' except this 'presence' which has 'false' as a child.)

diagnosis_{n}.when: blank (data_type:number, range_candidate_guide:Enter the patient's age at the time of the event, not the date)
diagnosis_{n}.length: blank (data_type:number, range_candidate_guide:0-24 (Unit: week, over 24 is represented as 24))

encounter_{n}.side effect: blank (data_type:string, range_candidate_guide:If there was a side effect, fill in this node. Otherwise, leave it as "None".)
encounter_{n}.reason for discontinuing: blank (data_type:string, range_candidate_guide:non-effective/financial problem/moving to new town/None (If there was discontinuing, fill in this node. Otherwise, leave it as "None".))

Past medical history.presence: blank (data_type:boolean, range_candidate_guide:Randomize(50%) the presence or absence of past medical history. If 'false', then remove all children of 'pmh' except this 'presence' which has 'false' as a child.)
Past medical history.history_{n}: blank (data_type:string, range_candidate_guide:Describe a past medical history)

current medication.side effect: blank (data_type:string, range_candidate_guide:If there was a side effect, fill in this node. Otherwise, leave it as "None".)

Family history.presence: blank (data_type:boolean, range_candidate_guide:Randomize(50%) the presence or absence of family history. If 'false', then remove all children of 'fh' except this 'presence' which has 'false' as a child.)
Family history.fh_diagnosis: blank (data_type:string, range_candidate_guide:Describe a psychiatric family history)
Family history.fh_substance_use: blank (data_type:string, range_candidate_guide:Describe a family history of substance use (alcohol, drugs, etc.).)

Developmental/Social history.abnormality in prenatal/birthing history: blank (data_type:string, range_candidate_guide:Randomize presence/absence (50%). If yes, write a description; otherwise, enter None.)
Developmental/Social history.delay in developmental milestone: blank (data_type:string, range_candidate_guide:Randomize presence/absence (50%). If yes, write a description; otherwise, enter None.)

childhood history.social environment: blank (data_type:string, range_candidate_guide:Describe things like number and quality of friends.)

Developmental/Social history.school history: blank (data_type:string, range_candidate_guide:special education/learning disorder/behavioral problem/low academic performance/problem in extracurricular activity)
Developmental/Social history.work history: blank (data_type:string, range_candidate_guide:Describe things like job, performance, reason for switching jobs, relationship with supervisor, coworker, etc.)
